title: Handyman Pixel Art Construction Kit Props
description: Construction Kit made up of Pixel Art Low Poly 3d Assets for your handyman needs.
longDescription:
Ever wanted to go for a Pixel Art look but have yet to find the right asset?

Wanted to bring back that old school vibe in your game.. but couldn't find the right tools?


Well look no further since The Handyman Pixel Art Construction Kit brings you.. almost everything you may need. (Workers and Power Tools not included. Elbow Grease required from buyer)

Enough items to build a house using wood, make a sewage system and some items to hold it all in.


Don't worry though, the tools required for all of that building.. are included.

From Wrenches to Saws and Crowbars (if.. you are still waiting for that 3rd installment) but also a crayon, clipboard, measuring tapes, levels, flashlights and enough power switches and sockets to light up your life.. I mean house.


And.. if you feel that you just can't have enough anymore.. the bloody version for some of the tools is also included. Gotta get rid of the pesky rodents somehow. Just don't forget to maintain your tools otherwise you may find that some of them are now rusted.


All in all, after a long day of work, you may also pop a cold one.. or have an energy drinking with a sandwich or an apple. all in your cute little rocket man blue lunchbox.


With the advertisement now over, this asset pack includes various tools and props for a kit that may be used for anything you may want. Most tools come with a bloody and rusted version, and some/most other props come with a recolorable version or different textures. (Check the material instance folder for most of that)


In the pack besides tools, are included some power related items such as a light bulb, sockets and plugs, boxes barrels, crates and other goodies.

All assets are low poly with a pixelated touch added to them.

technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Pixelated Art (Old School boomer shooter feel to construction tools)
  • Low Poly (562 Vertices on most demanding asset)
  • Contains Most of Tools you may find on a construction site. (All hand tools, no power tools)Â 
  • Couple of container like objects are included
  • Now with food and drinks!
  • Power Themed meshes (Light Bulb, switches, cords)

Number of Unique Meshes: 58 Unique Meshes (Around 100 with resized versions for some of them)

Collision: Yes, automatically generated and per-poly mix based on complexity of asset

Vertex Count: 24 (Lowest) - 562 (Highest)

LODs: Small Prop

Number of Materials and Material Instances: 1 (Material) 81 (Instances) (30 Example Instances)

Number of Textures: 75 Textures

Texture Resolutions: 16x16, 26x26, 32x32, 95x179, 208x208,512x512, 845x856

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Documentation: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1xAsdkntE3wcoKhaphwwt93J7AL4FiH9akznxPlKMt6k

Additional Information: No Shader or Outline post process is included. There are other assets that do that better than I could. This pack may work quite well with some of those for that extra feel.
